Inside

The permanent attacks of the Government of Milei and its henchmen who question their policy of emptying and refinancing of public and private cultural institutions of long experience and international recognition, and to whom they criticize government ignorance about the functioning and cultural management cause discouragement, uneasiness , fear and anger.

His fierce offensive against Lali Espósito has no limits. While that of "La Operara" and her vice denounce that the young singer is hired with "the state", shut up and hide that the municipality of Mar del Plata pays 50 million pesos for a couple of emissions of "the Legrand and her granddaughter ”, in that city. Thus riding a media show in the networks hide the underlying problem: the destruction of the country.

Many are the artists, actors, filmmakers, scientists, researchers who are concerned about the present and future of our culture and education and critic Risk hundreds of thousands of jobs in different areas in each of the provinces.

Thus they have manifested from Peteco Carabajal, Dillom, divided, Babasónicos, Molotov and many others.

Our culture expresses the identity and feeling deeper of our people and has a long history sown by various ethnic and aesthetic contributions.

When with maneuvers of this type it is tried to discipline and submit to the people, “from the foot” is mobilized, from the deepest support and reaction against these authoritarian and impoverishing forms that through the control of the State want to impose a vision and vision and A course contrary to national interests.

In all provinces, in each cultural, scientific, sports event, in the neighborhood assemblies and in each corner the pronouncements of repudiation and struggle of our culture that do not surrender grow.
